scripts.preinstall: npm config set chromedriver_skip_download=true && npm install chromedriver --chromedriver_skip_download=true
scripts.test:dataExchange: npx wdio config.import.js && node sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio config.export.js && node sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio config.parallel.js && node sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio config.parallel.shard.js && node sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio config.js
